ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/21/99 12:44:24 PM Central Daylight Time, topaaz_ladyjay@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/21/99 12:44:24 PM Central Daylight Time,
topaaz_ladyjay@... writes:

<< most clerics are good natured, but others just role-play, and i do not.
Many is the day i will heal a member of the HATE follower, and i get yelled
at that they would rather die than be healed by the likes of me, so ya know
what i do? I heal them full, then buff them to the max!!! LOL i love it,
reguardless of which god you follow you are a cleric, and clerics heal,
thats their job! plain and simple!! >>


hehe, good show... this is what I do as well. Even if someone is being an
ass, I'll help them out.

Nofur
